overview.title: About Volume Converter
overview.content: Our volume converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert between different volume measurement units. Supports all major units: liters, gallons, and cubic meters.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All volume units are converted through the base unit - liter. Each unit has its own conversion formula, ensuring calculation accuracy.

units.title: Supported Units
units.content: The converter supports 3 main volume units: liters (L), gallons (gal), and cubic meters (m¬≥).

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate calculations, instant conversion, 4 languages support, user-friendly interface, mobile version.

faqItems.q: How to convert liters to gallons?
faqItems.a: Divide liters by 3.78541 to get gallons. For example: 3.78541 L = 3.78541 √∑ 3.78541 = 1 gallon.

faqItems.q: How to convert m¬≥ to liters?
faqItems.a: Multiply cubic meters by 1000 to get liters. For example: 1 m¬≥ = 1 √ó 1000 = 1000 L.

faqItems.q: How to convert gallons to m¬≥?
faqItems.a: Multiply gallons by 3.78541, then divide by 1000. For example: 1 gallon = 1 √ó 3.78541 √∑ 1000 = 0.00378541 m¬≥.
A gallon is a unit of volume equal to 3.78541 liters. Used in the United States and some other countries.
